VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

SRP.A: Recruitment is positioned {on the same side} Health & Safety.

VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Employee Lifecycle}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Employee Lifecycle exceed 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Employee Lifecycle, Recruitment, Employee Development, or Performance Management?
NC.A: The value of {Employee Lifecycle} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Employee Lifecycle, Recruitment, or Employee Development?
NC.A: The value of {Employee Lifecycle} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Employee Lifecycle or Recruitment?
NC.A: The value of {Employee Lifecycle} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Recruitment, Employee Development, or Workplace Wellbeing?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Employee Development to Performance Management to Feedback}.
